entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
